info.description: This web interface allows one to use with the provided recommendations.
info.title: CROSSMINER APIs

post.summary: This API returns the m3 model of the input jar file

get.summary: This API returns the snippet (pointed by @clientLoc) of code of @coordV1
This API returns the delta between coordV1 and coordV2

post.summary: This API returns detections

get.summary: This API returns the migration matrix of coord (groupid:artifactid)

post.summary: This API returns recommendation
This API returns recommendation

get.summary: This API returns stack overflow posts related to the version parameters
This API returns all client that use a specific dependency coordV1
This API returns all client pairs that migrate from coordV1 to coordV2

post.summary: Import projects from the metric provider platform from a specific url. The url should be <server_url>:<server_port>
Import projects from the metric provider platform
Add github project to KB. use <owner>--<repo>

get.summary: Get artifact by metric platform id
This resource is used to retrieve the list of artifacts analyzed by the CROSSMINER

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: This resource is used to retrieve the list of deplovelor acvtivity metrics

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

post.summary: Store IDE metrics
This API stores the lib boost values given as txt file

parameters.name: sim_method
parameters.description: String value which can be Compound, CrossSim, Dependency, Readme, RepoPalCompound or RepoPalCompoundV2.

parameters.name: cluster_algo
parameters.description: String value which can be Clara, KMeans, or HCLibrary.

parameters.name: sim_method
parameters.description: String value which can be Compound, CrossSim, Dependency, Readme, RepoPalCompound or RepoPalCompoundV2.

parameters.name: cluster_algo
parameters.description: String value which can be Clara, KMeans, or HCLibrary.

post.summary: This resource is used to retrieve recommendation about discussions and code snippets for C code using ElasticSearch Indexes.
This resource is used to retrieve recommendation about discussions and code snippets for Java code using ElasticSearch Indexes.
This resource is used to retrieve recommendation about discussions and code snippets for JavaScript code using ElasticSearch Indexes.
This resource is used to retrieve recommendation about discussions and code snippets for PHP code using ElasticSearch Indexes.
This resource is used to retrieve recommendation about the next API function calls. It integrates FOCUS technology.
This resource is used to retrieve recommendation about the next API function calls. It integrates FOCUS technology.

get.summary: This resource forces tha KB to compute all similarity matrixes

post.summary: This resource stores the recommendation feedback
This resource is used to retrieve code patterns from code context.
This resource is used to retrieve documentation recommendation from code context.
This resource is used to retrieve recommended libraries.

get.summary: This resource is used to retrieve projects that are similar to a given project.

parameters.name: sim_method
parameters.description: results are computed by using the similarity function specified as parameter.  String value which can be Compound, CrossSim, Dependency, CrossRec, Readme, RepoPalCompound or RepoPalCompoundV2.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the string ID of a specific artifact.

parameters.name: num
parameters.description: Number of expected projects in the results

post.summary: This resource lists plugin versions for each dependecies
